revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Team Galactic Eterna Building |image = [[File:Team_Galactic_Eterna_Building.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of the Team Galactic Eterna Building. |tokens = 54,250 |location = Eterna City. }} The '''Team Galactic Eterna Building''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 877,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=6|<center> N/A || [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Stunky.png|40px]] Stunky |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk |- | [[File:Galactic_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Galactic Grunt || [[File:Stunky.png|40px]] Stunky, [[File:Croagunk.png|40px]] Croagunk, [[File:Glameow.png|40px]] Glameow |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientist Travon || [[File:Kadabra.png|40px]] Kadabra |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Rotom_(Heat).png|40px]] '''Rotom (Heat)*''' ||rowspan=5|<center>4,300,000 || rowspan=5|<center>[[File:Commander_(jupiter).png|40px]] Commander Jupiter ||rowspan=5|[[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Skuntank.png|40px]] Skuntank || rowspan=5|<center>2,150,000 |- || [[File:Rotom_(Wash).png|40px]] '''Rotom (Wash)*''' |- || [[File:Rotom_(Frost).png|40px]] '''Rotom (Frost)*''' |- || [[File:Rotom_(Fan).png|40px]] '''Rotom (Fan)*''' |- || [[File:Rotom_(Mow).png|40px]] '''Rotom (Mow)*''' |- |} '''*Must have cleared Team Galactic Eterna Building at least once and caught Rotom from Old Chateau to unlock Rotom forms.'''
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="No Debuff"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Toxic Plate}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.21% || 10.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 4.03% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
